group_OWID_Continent.name: Continent
group_OWID_Continent.description: Continents according to Our World in Data

area.name: Area
area.source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations. Published by World Bank in the World Development Indicators

gdp.name: GDP

gdp_per_captia.name: GDP per capita
gdp_per_captia.source: Calculated by dividing GDP to Population based on Our World in Data Energy Dataset
